root: ^A beautiful sword lies shattered on an altar, humming with a sad, broken energy.

c-1: ^You pledge to see this through, using the broken blade as a symbol of your resolve. A ghostly energy strengthens your arm. (Buff: +3 STR for 3 fights)

Repair_Success: ^[STR ≥18] You focus your strength and grip the pieces, forcing them together. The blade magically reforms in your hand! (Got Arcane Blade)
Repair_Fail: ^[STR <18] You try, but the magical shards are sharp and resist your grip, cutting your hands. (-15 HP)
Salvage_Success: ^[INT ≥15] You recognize the valuable enchanted metal and find a way to carefully melt it down for scrap. (+120 Gold)
Salvage_Fail: ^[INT <15] You can't figure out how to work the strange metal. You give up.
